```{r fig8a, echo = FALSE, out.width = '98%', fig.asp = 1.1, fig.cap = "features of a series."}
d <- data.frame(i = 1:100)

d$x <- rnorm(nrow(d), 0, 2)
d$mean <- mean(d$x)
d$variance <- var(d$x)
d$autocorrelation <- cor(d$x, lag(d$x), use = "complete.obs")
d$rolling_mean <- zoo::rollapply(d$x, 10, fill = NA, mean)
d$rolling_variance <- zoo::rollapply(d$x, 10, fill = NA, var)
d$roling_autocorrelation <- zoo::rollapply(d$x, 10, fill = NA,
                         function(x) {
                           cor(x, lag(x), use = "complete.obs")
                          })

d <- tidyr::gather(d, aspect, value, -i)
d$aspect = factor(
  d$aspect,
  levels = c(
    "x", "mean", "variance", "autocorrelation", 
    "rolling_mean", "rolling_variance", "roling_autocorrelation"))

ggplot(data = d, 
       aes(x = i, 
           y = value)) +
  geom_point(alpha = .3, size = .8) + 
  geom_line() + 
  facet_wrap(~ aspect, scales = "free", ncol = 2) + 
  theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(),
        axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank())
```
